name: dist_to_big_rivers
title: Distance to Commercial Rivers
description: Distance to rivers generally large enough to support large-scale commercial traffic, measured in meters, based on the HydroSHEDS product.  HydroSHEDS is a mapping product that provides hydrographic information for regional and global-scale applications in a consistent format. It offers a suite of geo-referenced data sets (vector & raster) at various scales, including river networks, watershed boundaries, drainage directions, and flow accumulations. HydroSHEDS is based on high-resolution elevation data obtained during a Space Shuttle flight for NASA's Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM).

extras.citation: Lehner, B., Verdin, K., Jarvis, A. (2008): New global hydrography derived from spaceborne elevation data. Eos, Transactions, AGU, 89(10): 93-94.
extras.sources_name: World Wildlife Fund (WWF) Conservation Science Program
